title: Shaved Ice Party
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>What’s this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>A shaved ice maker. By putting ice into this part here, and turning this... there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Ah! You can shave it, just like that!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Here, I’ll put this in, all at once! There-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu wants to try it too! Let me try, let me try… There—!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Huh!? L-Lanzhu-san, the ice is about to overflow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I’m gonna keep shaving more! Bring out more plates, Dia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>U-Understood! But just a moment please, I’ll call Ruby and tell her that we’re starting a shaved ice party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Call everyone! Lanzhu’s gonna keep shaving more~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ah, um, Lanzhu-san, please wait~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
